subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: In the shadows of the mighty Patriots, Celtics and Red Sox are the Bentley Falcons, a Division II men’s basketball team that has won 45 consecutive regular-season games.
snippet: In the shadows of the mighty Patriots, Celtics and Red Sox are the Bentley Falcons, a Division II men’s basketball team that has won 45 consecutive regular-season games.
